abstract: Alex Rios is convicted of beating homeless men Allison Gorman and Kee Thompson to death with cinder blocks in Albuquerque vacant lot in 2014.
lead_paragraph: A jury convicted a 20-year-old man Wednesday of beating two homeless men to death with cinder blocks and other items as they slept last year in Albuquerque.

headline.main: New Mexico: Conviction in Murders of Homeless Men
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Conviction in Murders of Homeless Men

snippet: A jury convicted a 20-year-old man Wednesday of beating two homeless men to death with cinder blocks and other items as they slept last year in Albuquerque.
